title: bone steak with tomato chilli chutney
description: Chargrilled steak - who can resist? Served here with sweet and sharp tomato chutney and chargrilled figs.
ingredients: 1.5kg/3lb 5oz ripe red tomatoes, very roughly chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 banana shallots, skin on, cut in half lengthways
4 fresh figs, cut in half lengthways
